description:
An incredibly intricate clock where every visible surface appears to be gilded or chrome.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

This crystal rod changes hue at random.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A strange monitor with a variety of knobs and dials.  When you turn it on, it crackles and then begins tracking things that either aren't there or aren't visible to the naked eye.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

name.str: a mess of tubes and wires
name.str_pl: several messes of tubes and wires

description:
What is it for?  What could it do?
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

It's a sculpture, but you can't identify what it depicts.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

It hums louder when you touch it.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

This looks like a musical instrument.  But how would you play it?
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A sheet so light and thin that viewing it horizontally makes it almost invisible.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A prickly ball that, no matter the force you apply, somehow never feels as if it could cut.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

Despite its looseness, this mass of goo keeps its shape as you fold it in your hands.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A rod with a bulbous, spiralling knob on the end that seems to spin as you look.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

One of those pins you wear on your shirt, but this one has indecipherable symbols in place of a witty slogan.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A tube of unknown material.  A strange noise from nowhere can be heard when you place it next to your ear, as if something's inside.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A triangular pyramid, inconspicuous in every way.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A beautiful crystal, which seems to suck in detail rather than merely obscuring it as light passes through.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

A bit of spiralling rope, disorienting you as your eyes vainly try to complete following the loop.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.

The sound of the tide can be heard from this stone, as if it were a miniature moon moving the oceans.
It may have unknown powers; try activating them.
